channel.title: Graphics issue?
channel.description:
At random times, the walls turn to a weird looking texture that gives off a little bit of light...
![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png)
Anyone know what this is?

item.title: Graphics issue?
item.dc:creator: M4TT
item.description:
I don’t think so. It doesn’t do it all the time. Just randomly after the game loads the next map. Other than that, the mod runs great. I have the latest drivers, and I tried reinstalling the mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Graphics issue?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Your computer should stop doing drugs.

Or maybe your graphics card is overheating, or needs the most recent drivers or you need to reinstall the mod.

My bet is on the drugs, tho.

Read full topic
